comment:
>You frown—he looks pretty damn sad. “You gonna be okay?”

>“Yeah, I'm fine. She was the first person I met in-game... I didn't expect.” He growls, then yells, eliciting a few stares. “Fuck this game! Top guilds acting like they control us, nameless assholes killing our fucking friends! Who EVEN can you trust? Why am I even this upset?”
name: Anonymous
